pr_title: Javadoc for some client, datafixer and other miscellaneous areas.

timeline.message: Javadoc for some client, datafixer and misc.

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change COMMENT The integrated server is only present when a local single player world is open. COMMENT

The integrated server is only present when a local single player world is open.
timeline.author: liach
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -182,6 +182,9 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_310 net/minecraft/client/MinecraftClient
 	METHOD method_1573 forcesUnicodeFont ()Z
 	METHOD method_1574 tick ()V
 	METHOD method_1576 getServer ()Lnet/minecraft/class_1132;
+		COMMENT Gets this client's own integrated server.
+		COMMENT
+		COMMENT The integrated server is only present when a local single player world is open.

timeline.author: liach
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -17,6 +17,9 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_640 net/minecraft/client/network/PlayerListEntry METHOD method_2963 setGameMode (Lnet/minecraft/class_1934;)V METHOD method_2966 getProfile ()Lcom/mojang/authlib/GameProfile; METHOD method_2967 hasSkinTexture ()Z + COMMENT Checks if the player represented by this entry has a custom skin. + COMMENT + COMMENT

If the player has the default {@code Steve} or {@code Alex} skin, this will return false.

timeline.author: liach

timeline.bodyText: Is this a block entity or a block entity type?
timeline.author: liach

replies.bodyText: This refers to the block entity itself.
replies.author: i509VCB

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change COMMENT A type reference which refers to an item's name. COMMENT COMMENT

The name refers to the identifier this item is registered to. COMMENT A type reference which refers to an item's identifier.
timeline.author: liach

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change COMMENT A type reference which refers to a entity's name. COMMENT COMMENT

The name refers to the identifier this entity is registered to. COMMENT A type reference which refers to a entity's identifier.
timeline.author: liach

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change COMMENT A type reference which refers to a block's name. COMMENT COMMENT

The name refers to the identifier this block is registered to. COMMENT A type reference which refers to a block's identifier.

 		ARG 1 subject
 		ARG 2 equalValue
 	METHOD method_10688 update (Lcom/mojang/datafixers/DataFixer;Lnet/minecraft/class_4284;Lnet/minecraft/class_2487;I)Lnet/minecraft/class_2487;

timeline.bodyText: Please mention that this is under the play-stage protocol.
timeline.author: liach
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,4 +1,5 @@
 CLASS net/minecraft/class_2602 net/minecraft/network/listener/ClientPlayPacketListener
+	COMMENT A client side packet listener where packets from the server are processed.

timeline.bodyText: Also please refer to the play stage protocol.
timeline.author: liach
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,4 +1,5 @@
 CLASS net/minecraft/class_2792 net/minecraft/network/listener/ServerPlayPacketListener
+	COMMENT A server side packet listener where packets from a client are processed.

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            	METHOD method_9200 shouldSendCommandFeedback ()Z
          
          
            
            	METHOD method_9200 shouldReceiveFeedback ()Z
          
      
    
    
  

This is already a "command output", and this output is not sending feedback but receiving feedback
timeline.author: liach
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,6 +1,7 @@
 CLASS net/minecraft/class_2165 net/minecraft/server/command/CommandOutput
+	COMMENT Represents a subject which can receive command feedback. 
 	FIELD field_17395 DUMMY Lnet/minecraft/class_2165;
-	METHOD method_9200 sendCommandFeedback ()Z
+	METHOD method_9200 shouldSendCommandFeedback ()Z

This checks both the entity's main and off hand. + ARG 1

timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -23,20 +23,31 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_2512 net/minecraft/nbt/NbtHelper
 		ARG 1 subject
 		ARG 2 equalValue
 	METHOD method_10688 update (Lcom/mojang/datafixers/DataFixer;Lnet/minecraft/class_4284;Lnet/minecraft/class_2487;I)Lnet/minecraft/class_2487;
+		COMMENT Uses the data fixer to update a tag to the latest data version.
 		ARG 0 fixer
+			COMMENT the data fixer
 		ARG 1 fixTypes
+			COMMENT the fix types
 		ARG 2 tag
+			COMMENT the tag to fix
 		ARG 3 oldVersion
+			COMMENT the data version of the compound tag
 	METHOD method_10691 toBlockPos (Lnet/minecraft/class_2487;)Lnet/minecraft/class_2338;
 		ARG 0 tag

 		ARG 3 oldVersion
